2+1.sig_info: Degenerate the Opponent, dealing 10.38 to 20.75 direct damage over 2 second(s).

PASSIVE: Immune to Bleed, Poison, Coldsnap, and Frostbite.
His durable Technarch form grants Warlock a permanent Armor Up Buff, increasing Armor Rating by +533.33. If this Buff is removed for any reason, it will refresh itself after 10 second(s).
While this Buff is active, Opponent’s Special Attacks cannot be Critical.
CONTACT: The Opponent gains a charge of Techno-Organic Transmode Virus. The Virus is not affected by Ability Accuracy.

Once the Opponent has 20 charges, they are removed and replaced with one Infection Passive that lasts for 20 second(s). The duration is decreased by 6 second(s) for each unique Buff on the Opponent when it activates.
TECHNO-ORGANIC TRANSMODE VIRUS INFECTION: The Opponent is Heal Blocked. If the Salve Mastery is active, the Mastery is removed.
The Opponent has -30% Offensive Ability Accuracy.
Whenever the Opponent would gain Health while infected, Warlock Power Drains them for 5% of their current Power over 0.50 second(s).
BLOCKING: If the Block was Well-Timed, the Opponent gains 3 Virus charges.
If the hit was a non-contact Basic Attack, the Opponent instantly Drains 10% of their current Power.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Lacerate opponents, inflicting 78.85 Bleed damage over 5 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The last hit Shocks the Opponent, dealing 124.5 energy damage over 10 second(s). If they are Infected, this also triggers when the Attack is activated, but lasts half as long.
The first hit removes all Infections to Passively Drain 25% of the Opponent’s Max Power over 5.50 second(s) for each Infection removed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit places two Armor Break Debuffs on Opponent, each reducing Armor Rating by 1600 for 10 second(s). If they are Infected, the Debuffs also trigger when the Attack is activated, but last half as long.
The last hit refreshes one Infection.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Passive Power Burn on the Opponent, draining 100% of their current Power over 5.50 second(s) and dealing damage proportionate to the amount lost.
Regenerate 44.4 Health for each Infection the Opponent has.

2+2.sig_info: Degenerate the Opponent, dealing 13.63 to 27.25 direct damage over 2 second(s).

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit places two Armor Break Debuffs on Opponent, each reducing Armor Rating by 1950 for 10 second(s). If they are Infected, the Debuffs also trigger when the Attack is activated, but last half as long.
The last hit refreshes one Infection.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Passive Power Burn on the Opponent, draining 100% of their current Power over 5.50 second(s) and dealing damage proportionate to the amount lost.
Regenerate 489 Health for each Infection the Opponent has.

5+3.sig_info: Degenerate the Opponent, dealing 158.13 to 474.38 direct damage over 2 second(s).

His durable Technarch form grants Warlock a permanent Armor Up Buff, increasing Armor Rating by +666.67. If this Buff is removed for any reason, it will refresh itself after 10 second(s).

CONTACT: The Opponent gains a charge of Techno-Organic Transmode Virus. The Virus is not affected by Ability Accuracy.
